title: Trump Admin Officials Sign Statement Cautioning against Resettling Afghans Who Did Not Directly Assist U.S.
content:
1. Trump Admin Officials Sign Statement Cautioning against Resettling Afghans Who Did Not Directly Assist U.S.  Yahoo News
  2. I don't believe Taliban pledge on women's rights, Priti Patel says  BBC News
  3. Some Afghan refugees will be resettled in North Texas  FOX 4 Dallas-Fort Worth
  4. UK plans to resettle 20,000 Afghans  The Khaama Press News Agency
  5. Fear of refugees must not shape the response to Afghanistan’s crisis  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Trump Admin Officials Sign Statement Cautioning against Resettling Afghans Who Did Not Directly Assist U.S.  Yahoo News

Some Afghan refugees will be resettled in North Texas  FOX 4 Dallas-Fort Worth

localize.title: 米国を直接支援していないアフガニスタン人を再定住させないよう注意する声明にトランプ政権の高官が署名。
特朗普政府官员签署声明，告诫不要重新安置没有直接协助过美国的阿富汗人。
特朗普政府官員簽署聲明，告誡不要重新安置沒有直接協助過美國的阿富汗人。
